experience.job_title: Certificate in Cognizant Artificial Intelligence Job Simulation
responsibilities: Conducted exploratory data analysis using Python and Google-Colab for one of Cognizant’s technology-led clients, Gala Groceries.
Prepared a Python module that contains code to train a model and output the performance metrics for the Machine Learning engineering team.
Communicated findings and analysis results back to the business.

projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction
details: Performed data-handling and Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) to identify trends and patterns in customer behavior.
Implemented multiple models, including Logistic Regression and Random Forest on both imbalanced and balanced (applied SMOTE) data.
Evaluated and compared results of Logistic Regression and Random Forest on both balanced and imbalanced data on classification metrics like accuracy, precision, and recall.

projects.title: Video Translation System (Guided by – Atlas Copco)
details: Successfully implemented speech to text using Whisper-AI, making subtitle generation more efficient.
Fine-tuned LLM (GPT) on videos provided by Atlas Copco to translate text from English to German and French.
Compared results of subtitle text-translation using BLEU score metric for multiple pre-trained machine-translation models, achieving high BLEU scores for French and German translations.

projects.title: Fish Species Identification
details: Developed a mobile application for Android platforms to identify fish species.
Integrated multiple datasets to create a comprehensive dataset.
Performed image data loading, pre-processing, model building, training, hyper-parameter tuning, and provided real-time location-based pricing.
Achieved an accuracy of 94.55% and tested the app on various fish species in local markets.

achievements.title: "Fishify: A Mobile-Based Fish Species Identification App with Transfer Learning Using MobileNetV1"
achievements.details: Presented at SmartCom 2024 and subsequently published by Springer.

achievements.title: “Edu-lingo: A Unified NLP Video System with Comprehensive Multilingual Subtitles”
achievements.details: Published as research by IEEE in IEEE Xplore.

extra_curricular.activity: Volunteered for ‘Vatsalya’ activity conducted by SW&D committee VIT Pune
extra_curricular.details: This activity aims to connect with old age homes and spend joyful time with the elderly.
